title: Fresca on Addison
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Pizza, Italian, Organic, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out
description: Vegetarian bistro making pizzas from stone oven, sandwiches, hearty soups, stews on brown rice (curry, ratatouille, cabbage and chorizo-ish) on brown rice, grits, quinoa, baked goods, coffee. Focus is on local, organic, and healthy. Dishes are available as vegan on request. Has Wi-Fi.
